description: An integer overflow in the Windows Mobile Broadband driver can be exploited when a malicious USB device is physically connected, allowing for remote code execution. This flaw affects several Windows builds, specifically versions 10.0.19045.4412, 10.0.22631.3593, 10.0.22621.3593, 10.0.22000.2960, and 10.0.19044.4412, as outlined in KB articles KB-5037771, KB-5037770, and KB-5037768.
